ehi aarambhakayano hingula dharmakirthi shri piyarathana himiyoya.wasara 1930 di pamana ithama kudawata arambai me wiharasthanaya eda medathura shasanika, aagamika saha samajiya sanwardhanaya punarudaya udesa laba dun nayakathwaya itukala sewawa athimahathya.dewanagala, madagoda, mahapitiya, aluthnuwara, yanadi pradesha rasaka janathawata aagamika alokaya labadima pinisa me wiharasthanaya aarambhaye patan ma katayuthu kaleya.

janatha chandayen prajathanthrawadiwa pathwana ape nayakayin prabhakarange mayil gasak tharamwath nowatina bawata sarath fonseka mahatha prakasha kirima kanagatuwata karunak bawa aithihasika bahirawakanda shri maha bodi wiharadhipathi mahanuwara kadawathsathara ha gangawata korale uthuru shasanarakshaka bala mandalaye pradhana lekhakadhikari shasthrapathi yatawaththe dhammananda himiyo pawasuha.minimaru prabhakaran ha ape nayakayin sasandima pawa nowatina bawada unwahanse kiha.
